description: Scirocco has taught you the ancient powers of the Mu. In their eternal struggle against the Oranbega, the Mu have unlocked many mystical powers, including their very signature crimson lightning.  Now you posses these their secrets.

description.long: Hurls multiple bolts of Mu Electricity in an arc that deals damage and drains Endurance from all affected foes in the area. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a charged field that makes you highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal and Energy damage. Recharge: Fast

description.short: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Energy), Foe Immobilize, -END
description.long: The Electrifying Fences attempts to Immobilize a group of foes in an area. This power deals some energy damage over time as it slowly drains some Endurance. You must be level 41 and have Thunder Strike or Charged Armor before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

description.short: Melee (AoE), High DMG(Smash, Energy), Foe Disorient, Knockback, -End
description.long: A massive attack. You smash your foes with all the power of a lightning bolt. The pummeled victim takes tremendous damage and may be Disoriented. Any nearby foes may be knocked down and take some damage from the shockwave, as well as have some endurance drained. You must be level 41 and have Thunder Strike or Charged Armor before selecting this power. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

Electric Shackles binds a foes limbs, leaving the target held and helpless. The target is drained of some Endurance and some of that Endurance may be transferred back to you. You must be level 44 and have two other Mu Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Long
